mapper.update:
update PARTNER
INSTNAME = #{instname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOGOURL = #{logourl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTRACT = #{contract,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_LOGIN_TIME = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_MODIFY_TIME = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ENABLED = #{enabled,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
WHOLENAME = #{wholename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LICENCE = #{licence,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGANIZATIONNUM = #{organizationnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REFERENCE = #{reference,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARTNERINTRO = #{partnerintro,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARTNERDISTINCTION = #{partnerdistinction,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LICENCEIMGURL = #{licenceimgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TAXREGIMGURL = #{taxregimgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EDUQUALIFICATIONIMGURL = #{eduqualificationimgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HQLOCATION = #{hqlocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

HQCONTACTPHONE = #{hqcontactphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

CUTOFFDAY = #{cutoffday,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CUTOFFTIME = #{cutofftime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PARTNERQUALIFICATION = #{partnerqualification,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
